content: I submitted the main part of my pset yesterday and haven’t updated or changed any of my work since. However I’ve been giving partial guidance to some others in the class (in accordance to collaboration guidelines) and I haven’t put their names down in my pset as collaborators. Do I need to update and resubmit my files and do that? Or do I not need to because I’ve made no changes based off of these interactions?
subject: Collaboration after Submission

content: Just make sure that they include you as a collaborator.
